text_content: 6M AI users  NEAR and $ICP  have been focusing heavy on public-facing AI apps. $DOT  Price to Hit Another All-Time Low After Failing to Hold $2.   It remains under strong bearish pressure after a 9.08% weekly drop.The decline has pushed price below the key $2.00 psychological level, handing short-term control to sellers.With no signs of strong demand, the move looks less like a pullback and more like a continuation of the broader downtrend.  While the Money Flow Index (MFI) is deeply oversold at 16.46, this condition alone does not indicate an imminent reversal.  Instead, it highlights how aggressively sellers have dominated recent sessions, with capital continuing to exit rather than rotate back into DOT  ï»¿#Macro Insights#  #Meme Alpha#
